IR Receiver raw codes

dev board RobotDyn M0 mini
sensor infrared
features infrared IR receive raw

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • IRLib2

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. IR Receiver
  2. IR Raw Receiver

Buy the components

  1. RobotDyn M0 Mini

Code

Download code ir-raw-receive-zero.ino

Makefile

Description

This code dumps the raw IR code length when detected.

References

  1. Use Arduino AVR Board version 1.6.21
  2. IRLib2 for Arduino Infrared
  3. Raw receive code example
